targets.rawSql:
SELECT countIf(response_status_code = '200') * 100.0 / count(*) as success_rate FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT countIf(total_request_duration > 3) * 100.0 / count(*) as slow_rate FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT quantile(0.95)(total_request_duration * 1000) as p95_response_time FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT count(DISTINCT request_uri_normalized) as unique_apis FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT request_uri_normalized as `APIÊé•Âè£`, api_category as `APIÁ±ªÂà´`, count() as `ÊÄªËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, countIf(total_request_duration > 3) as `ÊÖ¢ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, countIf(total_request_duration > 3) * 100.0 / count() as `ÊÖ¢ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊØî‰æã(%)`, avg(total_request_duration * 1000) as `Âπ≥ÂùáÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)`, quantile(0.50)(total_request_duration * 1000) as `P50ÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)`, quantile(0.95)(total_request_duration * 1000) as `P95ÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)`, quantile(0.99)(total_request_duration * 1000) as `P99ÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)`, countIf(response_status_code >= '400') as `ÈîôËØØÊï∞`, countIf(response_status_code >= '400') * 100.0 / count() as `ÈîôËØØÁéá(%)` FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY request_uri_normalized, api_category HAVING countIf(total_request_duration > 3) > 0 ORDER BY countIf(total_request_duration > 3) DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT platform as `Âπ≥Âè∞`, api_category as `APIÁ±ªÂà´`, count() as `ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, avg(total_request_duration * 1000) as `Âπ≥ÂùáÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)`, quantile(0.95)(total_request_duration * 1000) as `P95ÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)`, countIf(total_request_duration > 3) as `ÊÖ¢ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, countIf(total_request_duration > 3) * 100.0 / count() as `ÊÖ¢ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊØî‰æã(%)`, countIf(response_status_code >= '400') * 100.0 / count() as `ÈîôËØØÁéá(%)` FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY platform, api_category ORDER BY avg(total_request_duration * 1000) DESC LIMIT 15

SELECT api_category as `APIÁ±ªÂà´`, count() as `ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, countIf(total_request_duration <= 0.1) as `ÊûÅÂø´(<100ms)`, countIf(total_request_duration > 0.1 AND total_request_duration <= 0.5) as `Âø´ÈÄü(100-500ms)`, countIf(total_request_duration > 0.5 AND total_request_duration <= 1) as `Ê≠£Â∏∏(500ms-1s)`, countIf(total_request_duration > 1 AND total_request_duration <= 3) as `ÊÖ¢ÈÄü(1-3s)`, countIf(total_request_duration > 3) as `ÊûÅÊÖ¢(>3s)`, avg(total_request_duration * 1000) as `Âπ≥ÂùáÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)` FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY api_category ORDER BY avg(total_request_duration * 1000) DESC

SELECT $__timeInterval(log_time) as time, api_category, avg(total_request_duration * 1000) as response_time FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY time, api_category ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeInterval(log_time) as time, platform, countIf(total_request_duration > 3) as slow_requests FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) GROUP BY time, platform ORDER BY time

SELECT request_uri_normalized as `APIÊé•Âè£`, api_category as `APIÁ±ªÂà´`, any(platform) as `‰∏ªË¶ÅÂπ≥Âè∞`, count() as `ÊÄªËØ∑Ê±ÇÊï∞`, countIf(response_status_code >= '400') as `ÈîôËØØÊï∞`, countIf(response_status_code >= '400') * 100.0 / count() as `ÈîôËØØÁéá(%)`, countIf(response_status_code = '404') as `404ÈîôËØØ`, countIf(response_status_code = '500') as `500ÈîôËØØ`, countIf(response_status_code = '502') as `502ÈîôËØØ`, countIf(response_status_code = '503') as `503ÈîôËØØ`, avg(total_request_duration * 1000) as `Âπ≥ÂùáÂìçÂ∫îÊó∂Èó¥(ms)`, groupUniqArray(3)(response_status_code) as `ÈîôËØØÁä∂ÊÄÅÁ†ÅTop3` FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) AND response_status_code >= '400' GROUP BY request_uri_normalized, api_category ORDER BY countIf(response_status_code >= '400') DESC LIMIT 20
